title: UCLA, USC games face scorching heat, relaxed water policies
description: Los Angeles is facing an excessive heat warning as both UCLA and USC open their seasons Saturday at home. UCLA kicked off at 11:30 a.m. PT and USC will play at 3 p.m. PT.

title: Abducted Eliza Fletcher: Memphis police say 'vehicle of interest' located, male detained, Eliza still missing
description: Memphis police say that they have located a "vehicle of interest" and also said that one person has been arrested, but the missing mother has not been found.

title: LIV golfers now allowed to wear shorts in competition
description: The pants-versus-shorts debate has been ongoing on the PGA Tour for years. Naturally, LIV Golf is allowing its players to wear shorts, starting Saturday.

title: Afghanistan children killed after playing with unexploded ordnance that detonated in classroom
description: Four school children are dead in Afghanistan after an unexploded ordnance detonated after being brought into a classroom by children who were playing with it.

title: 2022 World Cup organizers agree to serve beer throughout tournament
description: Beer will flow during 2022 World Cup matches even though Qatar, the host country, only permits booze in hotel bars and restaurants that hold licenses.

title: Eliza Fletcher abduction: former homicide detective says teacher's disappearance may have been 'pre-planned'
description: Ted Williams, a former homicide detective, says the abduction of Memphis teacher Eliza Fletcher may have been 'pre-planned.' Video of the suspect vehicle will lead to answers.

title: Karine Jean-Pierre mocked for claiming US added ‘ten thousand million jobs’: ‘Staggering amateurism’
description: Twitter users savaged the White House press secretary after she claimed that the U.S. added "ten thousand million" jobs since President Biden took office.

title: Iowa Hawkeyes' wave to children's hospital headlines return of college football's best fan traditions
description: Some of college football's finest fan traditions returned Saturday with the true start to the college football season. Here's a look at some of those traditions.

title: Border Patrol agents arrest dozens of illegal immigrant criminals, gang members
description: Border Patrol agents in the Rio Grande Valley Sector have stopped multiple gang members and criminals, including those with convictions for sex offenses.

title: Tupelo pilot: Who is Cory Patterson?
description: Cory Patterson, the Tupelo pilot who stole an aircraft, worked at the regional airport for ten years as a lineman and it does not appear that he has a pilots license.

title: British pub owners facing murky future as energy prices skyrocket: 'Soul destroying'
description: An increasing number of British pubs may be forced to close their doors as skyrocketing energy prices in Europe continue to cause financial hardships for businesses.

title: FBI issue warning over anti-vaxxer who crossed Canadian border to 'protest' US open: report
description: Suspect Virpaul Singh Mahil allegedly told police he planned to protest the U.S. open as he was angry about vaccine mandates, which have prevented Novak Djokavic from playing.

title: MSNBC guest condemns Republicans as ‘evil’: ‘We are at war with these people’
description: On MSNBC's "The Cross Connection" Saturday, guest Roland Martin declared that Democrats are "at war" with "evil" Republicans and hailed President Biden's speech.

title: Florida 75-foot yacht catches fire, man hospitalized with burns
description: Police and firefighters in Aventura, Florida, responded to the scene of a yacht fire on Friday night. A person was injured in the blaze and is being treated.

title: Abducted Eliza Fletcher: Memphis teacher's husband spotted day after her disappearance
description: As the search for abducted Memphis teacher Eliza Fletcher continued Saturday, her husband was spotted outside their home. She was abducted Friday morning while on a run.

title: Ted Cruz returning to New Hampshire to support Leavitt in GOP primary in crucial House race
description: Sen. Ted Cruz of Texas is heading to New Hampshire this week on a 2022 mission that will also spark more speculation about his national ambitions in 2024

title: NASA weighs moving Artemis rocket off launch pad after second scrub
description: The Artemis launch was delayed for a second time after NASA engineers detected a fuel leak. The mission's management team is scheduled to meet to discuss its future.

title: Support for legal abortion grew after Dobbs ruling, which could affect midterm election turnout: WSJ Poll
description: American voters' support for legal abortion increased after the Supreme Court overturned Roe, and abortion is a major motivator for Democrats ahead of midterms, a WSJ poll found

title: Mississippi man who threatened to crash plane into Walmart charged with grand larceny, terroristic threats
description: The man who stole a plane in Mississippi and threatened to crash it into a Walmart has been charged with grand larceny and making terrorist threats

title: Oregon football to honor Spencer Webb with helmet decal
description: Oregon football will honor Spencer Webb with a special helmet decal after his death in a July accident. Webb switched from No. 18 to No. 4 before the 2022 season.

title: Latest migrant deaths in Rio Grande highlight extreme dangers facing border crossers
description: The deaths of multiple migrants in the Rio Grande this week highlights the perils facing those seeking to enter the U.S. via the southern land border by foot.

title: ‘The Shell Collector’ best-selling author shares inspiration behind Fox Nation’s first feature film
description: Best-selling author Nancy Naigle discusses the inspiration and messages behind 'The Shell Collector,' Fox Nation's first feature-length film, available now.

title: RNC investing millions to engage with Asian Pacific American voters, other minorities ahead of midterms
description: The RNC is investing millions in outreach to Asian American Pacific voters ahead of the midterm elections, opening its most recent community center in Issaquah, Washington.

title: Iran arms over 50 cities with defense system amid heightened tension with US
description: Iran has armed its cities and towns with a civil defense system that will allow its armed forces to quickly react should it be attacked by a foreign force.

title: Arizona Democratic lawmaker who just won Senate primary resigns
description: The Senate seat for southwest Phoenix is vacant after Diego Espinoza announced his resignation following his recent victory. He had served four terms in the House.

title: California wildfire sets homes ablaze, forces evacuations
description: A California wildfire has threatened northern communities, injuring several people and forcing evacuations. Multiple homes were destroyed in Mill Fire on Friday.

title: Economic analyst: Employees’ remote work push has ‘gone way overboard,’ impacts ‘productivity’
description: Fox News contributor Jonas Max Ferris says getting paid the same amount and producing less at work is an "inflationary concept" causing "major declines" in productivity.

title: Michigan House Dem candidate 'honored' to appear alongside show host who made antisemitic comments after 9/11
description: Carl Marlinga, a Democrat running to represent Michigan's 10th Congressional District, recently appeared on a Facebook Live program with a host who has made antisemitic remarks.

title: Kirk Herbstreit gives us our first ‘hot mic’ moment of the year on ESPN College GameDay
description: College football analyst Kirk Herbstreit got a little excited on College GameDay and was caught on a hot mic using a swear word before Week 1 of the college football season.

title: Dan Rather schooled on Twitter for wondering ‘what is going on’ with CNN: ‘Gone full MAGA’
description: Liberal Twitter users responded to former CBS anchor Dan Rather's question about "what is going on" at CNN, telling him the network has gone "full MAGA."

title: Liza Fletcher abduction: Timeline of the Memphis teacher's disappearance
description: Here is a timeline of events surrounding the disappearance of.Memphis teacher Eliza Fltecher, who was abducted Friday morning while on a jog near the University of Memphis.

title: Turkey warns Greece of 'heavy price' over island 'occupations': report
description: Turkey and Greece have continued to ramp up tensions over territorial disputes, which in turn has put pressure on NATO to maintain peace between the two member states.

title: Democrats are tactically ‘ignoring’ the rule of the law: Rep. Byron Donalds
description: Rep. Byron Donalds criticized President Biden's controversial speech on Thursday evening, arguing that it was a "dumb" political move by Democrats.

title: Al-Shabab extremists kill at least 20 travelers in Somalia
description: Al-Shabab extremists killed 20 travelers in Somalia, burning seven vehicles Saturday morning in an alleged retaliation by the al Qaeda-affiliated group.

title: Followers of social media spirituality influencer accused of 3 murders in Alabama: 'I am a god'
description: Three followers of social media influencer Rashad Jamal and his cult-like group have been accused of two separate murders in Alabama. Jamal is currently in prison.

title: Yankees blanked in Tampa Bay, lead in AL East down to 5 games: ‘That’s an embarrassing loss’
description: The New York Yankees were shut out for the sixth time since the All-Star break, losing 9-0 to the Tampa Bay Rays Friday night. Their lead in the AL East is down to five games.

title: Gorbachev funeral draws thousands in Russia, but not Putin
description: Russian President Vladimir Putin skipped out on Mikhail Gorbachev's funeral after he refused to declare a state funeral. Putin was critical of Gorbachev's relationship with the West.

title: WaPo editorial board says Biden’s ‘MAGA’ speech 'fell short’: 'demeaning' to 'conservatives of goodwill'
description: On Friday, The Washington Post Editorial Board slammed the "partisan" and "scolding" tone of President Biden's speech against "MAGA Republicans."

title: Old Dominion takes down Virginia Tech: ‘I couldn’t be more proud of this team’
description: For the second time in four tries, the Old Dominion Monarchs beat Virginia Tech, scoring the winning touchdown with 33 seconds to play in the fourth quarter.

title: Delicious beef-and-veggie kabob for a sizzling end-of-summer meal: Try the recipe
description: It's Labor Day weekend — and millions of Americans will be spending time with family and friends during the holiday. This recipe for a delicious beef-and-veggie kabob is easy to make.

title: Jim Wahlberg offers message of giving back during charity golf event: 'It's a matter of responsibility'
description: Executive director of the Mark Wahlberg Youth Foundation, Jim Wahlberg, shares the story behind his family's charity and says it's everyone's 'responsibility' to give back.

title: Vulnerable Democrats avoid Biden's anti-MAGA speech, Trump-backed candidates fire back at divisive remarks
description: President Joe Biden gave a speech Thursday, where he called MAGA Republicans "extreme threats to the democracy."

title: Memphis mom, 1-year-old abducted outside Target at midday; police hunt suspects
description: Memphis Police are looking for two men allegedly involved in the abduction and robbery of a mother and her 1-year-old this week. It happened in a Target parking lot.

title: Tupelo, Mississippi pilot threatening to crash plane into Walmart, police say
description: A pilot has threatened to crash into a Walmart in Tuleop, Mississippi authorities warned Saturday as they evacuated the area.

title: Tupelo, Mississippi pilot who threatened to ram plane into Walmart is down, in custody
description: A pilot has threatened to crash into a Walmart in Tuleop, Mississippi authorities warned Saturday as they evacuated the area.

title: Non-Hodgkin's lymphoma: What is the cancer that Jane Fonda announced she has?
description: Actress and activist Jane Fonda announced this week that she's been diagnosed with non-Hodgkin's lymphoma and has "started chemo treatments." But what is this form of cancer? Here are details.

title: If Republicans can't run against Democrats on abortion, they can't run against them on anything
description: Democratic Party is out of step with most Americans on the issue of abortion. Republicans have to make that clear if they expect to win the 2022 elections.

title: Weeks from midterm elections, Biden has endorsed just three Democrats while calling GOP 'threat' to democracy
description: President Joe Biden has endorsed a handful of Democratic candidates with just over two months before the November midterm elections, a fraction of Trump's endorsement totals.

title: Trump talk of ‘special master’ a distraction. Documents speak for themselves.
description: Trump team's calls for ‘special master’ are a distraction. The documents show what they show and Trump is protected from unfair search by the Constitution.

title: Canadian news anchor shares viral video of her swallowing fly during live broadcast
description: Global News anchor Farah Nasser said Monday on Twitter that she had swallowed a fly on-air as she was reporting on the devastating monsoons in Pakistan.

title: NY man who cycled across America settles down in this city: ‘Smoother transition than I thought'
description: Bob Barnes, 52, of Syracuse, New York, returned to his hometown after he completed his cross-country journey to all 50 U.S. state capitals in July 2022. Fox News Digital chronicled his biking trip.

title: College football Week 1 preview: Notre Dame, Ohio State highlight opening slate
description: Week 1 of the college football season kicks off Saturday with No. 5 Notre Dame traveling to No. 2 Ohio State with a 7:30 p.m. ET kickoff.

title: Pennsylvania manufacturing workers blast Biden's student loan handout as unfair
description: Pennsylvania manufacturing workers say President Biden's $500 billion student loan hand is a slap in the face to blue-collar America.

title: Turkish, Greek tension places pressure on NATO alliance
description: Greece and Turkey have been locked in a maritime and territorial dispute for decades, but with shifting geopolitical alliances and the discoveries of natural gas, relations have deteriorated sharply.

title: Michigan boy, 14, charged with murder in death of stepsister, 10
description: A juvenile in Michigan was arrested in connection with the death of his 10-year-old stepsister after she was reported missing and later found in a lot near the home.

title: Jackson, Mississippi officials say water issue is not new
description: On Tuesday the Pearl River flooded. The cresting of the river caused technical problems with Jackson's water system, leaving more than 160,000 residents without safe drinking water.

title: Tigers' Austin Meadows says mental health struggles have kept him off field
description: Austin Meadows has missed time this year with illness and injuries, but on Friday, he opened up about how his battle with mental health has kept him off the field.

title: Paul Newman, Hollywood star, 'was one of the guys’ as he pursued passion for racing, photographer says
description: Paul Newman, a star from Hollywood's golden era, passed away in 2008 at age 83 from cancer. While filming the movie "Winning" in 1969 at age 43, he discovered auto racing.

title: Georgia deputy police chief arrested in Florida for soliciting prostitution
description: A Georgia deputy police chief was arrested in Florida on charges of soliciting another for prostitution, lewdness or assignation. He has been placed on administrative leave,

title: Las Vegas man who died in Minnesota plane crash was scattering his father’s ashes: police
description: A Las Vegas man died just weeks after his father during a flight where he was dispersing his father ashes. Investigators have not determined the cause of the crash, which killed two.

title: Canadian TikTok influencer dies in skydiving accident
description: Tanya Pardazi, a 21-year-old social media influencer and college student, died in a skydiving accident last week after she opened her parachute too late.

title: US Treasury says request for Hunter Biden records must come from Dem-led committee, not Republicans
description: Republicans have been denied access to Hunter Biden's final records concerning 'suspicious activity reports' as the U.S. Treasury claims Democrat-led committees must request the information.

title: Moon launch: Americans weigh in on whether NASA's Artemis space program is worth the $93 billion cost
description: Americans sound off on whether they support paying for NASA's Artemis mission objective of landing astronauts on the lunar surface for the first time in decades.

title: Blind Michigan judge drives race car — and inspires others to follow their dreams, too
description: Richard Bernstein is a Michigan state Supreme Court justice who is legally blind. In addition to his work on the bench, he recently drove a race car with an assist from a sheriff who shared directions.

title: University of South Carolina cancels games with BYU amid alleged racist slur incident with Duke
description: The University of South Carolina women's basketball team has cancelled games with BYU in response to an alleged racial incident at a recent BYU women's volleyball game.

title: GREG GUTFELD: Biden made a wartime speech for Americans against Americans
description: Fox News host Greg Gutfeld slammed President Biden's Thursday night speech, claiming the real "threat to democracy" is not the "MAGA Republicans" but the Democratic Party.

title: Liza Fletcher investigation: Urgent call to prayer requested as teacher remains missing
description: Community members have issued urgent calls to pray for the safety and return of Liza Fletcher, a 34-year-old teacher who was allegedly abducted during an early morning jog.

description: Raymond Arroyo highlights some of the moments from President Biden's "soul of the nation" speech and the backlash received in its wake on "The Ingraham Angle."

description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis weighed in on President Biden’s Thursday night speech addressing citizens of the United States Friday on "The Ingraham Angle."

title: Adam Laxalt calls out sanctuary city mayors' complaints over busing migrants
description: Adam Laxalt says Chicago Mayor Lori Lightfoot should call out President Biden for his "open border" after complaining about migrants being bused to her city on "Hannity."

title: Biden will use the 'full force of the federal government' against you if you dare oppose him: Gregg Jarrett
description: Fox News legal analyst Gregg Jarrett slammed the Biden Department of Justice's raid of former President Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago residence as "lawless" on "Hannity."

title: Oregon GOP gubernatorial candidate: Portland needs to change
description: GOP gubernatorial nominee in Oregon Christine Drazan discusses how Portland is facing violent crime and decline and how Oregonians have had enough on "Hannity."

title: Missing Liza Fletcher: SUV towed from outside of abducted mom's house
description: Authorities towed a white SUV from the front of missing Tennessee woman Eliza Fletcher's home Friday evening. Fletcher was abducted on her jog the same morning.

title: $50K reward offered to help find mother kidnapped while jogging
description: The family of Eliza Fletcher, a 34-year-old Memphis mother of two, is offering a $50,000 reward to anyone who comes forward with information about her disappearance.

title: US Open 2022: Serena Williams falls in third round, capping off illustrious career
description: It's the end of an era, as Serena Williams dropped her third-round match at the U.S. Open on Friday night, capping off her illustrious career.

title: TUCKER CARLSON: Republicans must focus on issues that matter to Americans to win
description: Fox News host Tucker Carlson provides insight on key issues Republicans should speak to their constituents about ahead of the midterm elections on "Tucker Carlson Tonight."

title: California laundromat owner targeted by thieves pushes for more police; ‘crime escalating exponentially’
description: The owner of a California laundromat that was targeted by thieves pushed for more police officers to address crime and attacks against people of Asian descent.

title: Trey Gowdy: Biden's definition of a good Republican is 'one that agrees with him'
description: Trey Gowdy challenged President Biden's logic arguing that a good Republican is one who agrees with his ideology.

title: Who is Eliza Fletcher? Memphis teacher abducted during morning jog
description: Eliza Fletcher, a 34-year-old Memphis mother of two who went by Liza, was abducted by force during an early morning jog Friday, according to city police.

description: Kayleigh McEnany discusses with "The Five" the lawsuit facing the White House over the request for more evidence that the administration allegedly colluded with big tech to censor Americans.

description: Fox News host Greg Gutfeld shook off President Biden's Thursday night speech attacking "MAGA Republicans" as "hilarious" and having backfired on "The Five."

description: Fox News host Pete Hegseth weighs in on President Joe Biden's controversial address to the nation and analyzes his leadership on "Jesse Watters Primetime."

title: Department of Veterans Affairs to offer abortions to veterans in certain cases
description: The Department of Veterans Affairs will offer certain veterans abortions regardless of state laws where the procedure is restricted or outlawed, the agency said.
